group_1.textLeft: Taiyaki, tayakiiii... â™ª

group_1.textRight: You like taiyaki?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I love it as much as anyone else!

group_1.textRight: As much as anyone else, huh...
You seem way more excited than the average@person, though.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's because I've heard a story about a@taiyaki? That's why I really want to eat some.

group_1.textRight: So that's the reason.

group_1.textLeft: It was a very clever taiyaki!
I can taste it already!@I can't wait to eat it!

group_1.textRight: Mmhmm.
Ah, we're almost there.

group_1.textLeft: Hm? That girl...

group_1.textRight: Manaka, what are you doing here?

group_1.textLeft: Kanoko! I've been waiting for you!

group_1.textRight: Me?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's actually a bit of an emergency.
I'm sorry to bother you while you're with@your friend, but please!
I need a fashion item that you've designed!
Please give me one!

group_1.textRight: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh, what's with this out of the blue?!

group_1.textLeft: Actually...

group_1.textRight: You look good in anything you wear?
Then I bet you'd look great in something like@a prison uniform.

group_1.textLeft: Naturally!
If anything, the jailers would be the prisoners@to the beauty of Ria Ami!
Not only clothing, but every kind of fashion item@out there.
There isn't anything in the world that doesn't@look good on me!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah, I get it.
Now, I have to go do nothing in particular,@so if you'll excuse me...

group_1.textLeft: Stop right there! At least PRETEND you have@business to take care of!
It seems that you don't believe me...
In that case, let's make it an actual bet!

group_1.textRight: An actual bet! You're making this into@a big deal.

group_1.textLeft: Of course, because I know I'm going to win.
With my beauty, there's nothing I can't pull off!
Ohohohoho!

group_1.textRight: No way that's true!

group_1.textLeft: Well, unless it's something outlandish and bizarre@like Kanoko's designs...
I'll definitely win!

group_1.textRight: Got it, let's do it! I'll go ask Kanoko!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh nooooo!!!

group_1.textRight: Hmm...
It's true, my designs are far ahead of the@current fashion trends.
I don't think there are many models that@can pull it off, but...
I'm sorry... I don't have anything I can give@you right now...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, no, no! If you don't have anything, it's fine...!
(It pains me to receive such a serious apology@over something like this!)

group_1.textRight: If it's a hair clip...@[chara:300101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1]Oh, but Ria puts her hair up in twintails...

group_1.textLeft: That's right.

group_1.textRight: Twintails...@[chara:403201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:403201:motion_200][chara:403201:cheek_0][chara:403201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:403201:lipSynch_1]Then, would these work?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Kanoko's friend!

group_1.textRight: You can call me Matsuri!

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you, Matsuri!@[chara:300901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300901:cheek_0][chara:300901:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300901:lipSynch_1]By the way, these are...

group_1.textRight: They're scrunchies!

group_1.textLeft: Scrunchies!
These are also outlandish and bizarre...

group_1.textRight: I designed it, and the theme is@mouthwatering colors!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, this is Kanoko's design...

group_1.textRight: I have exactly two of them.
I figured these would be just right for that@twintail girl.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, they would be perfect!
...Um, then if you don't mind...@[wait:0.8][chara:300901:lipSynch_1]Could you give them to me?
Kanoko, what do you think?

group_1.textRight: They were given to you, so you can do@whatever you want with them.

group_1.textLeft: Okay!
Then I'll give both of them to Manaka!
Ah, thank you very much!
I'd like to express my gratitude...@Have this...

group_1.textRight: [chara:300101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wow!!!
Th-this is...! The phantom mushroom...!@"Daikoku Hon-shimeji"!!!

group_1.textLeft: Kanoko...?

group_1.textRight: Matsuri, this is a very expensive shimeji@mushroom!

group_1.textLeft: Um, it doesn't look like a shimeji,@though...

group_1.textRight: Of course not!
The classic shimeji, the bunapi-shimeji,@belongs to the genus Hypsizygus.
This Daikoku Hon-shimeji belongs to the genus@Lyophyllum, which is a completely different species.
Are matsutake mushrooms the pinnacle@of mushrooms? No way!
There's even a saying, "matsutake mushrooms@are fragrant, shimeji mushrooms are delicious."
The shimeji mushroom that gave rise to this@saying is the Daikoku Hon-shimeji.
The plump texture and succulent flavorâ€”

group_1.textLeft: Well, I'm kinda in a hurry, so...

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Manaka!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, thank you too!

group_1.textRight: Oh, she's gone...@I haven't finished thanking her yet...

group_1.textLeft: ...And now the scrunchie's mushrooms have@turned into a real mushroom.
